perturbation.original_text:
“Affiliate” shall mean, when used with respect to any Person, any other Person that, directly or indirectly, through one or more
intermediaries, controls, is controlled by, or is under common control with such Person. For this purpose, “control” of any Person shall mean the
possession, directly or indirectly, of the power to direct or cause the direction of the management and policies of such Person, by ownership of
voting interest, by contract or otherwise. For the purposes of this Agreement, (i) with respect to PennTex Midstream Partners, LLC and its
subsidiaries, the term “Affiliate” shall exclude Memorial Resource Development Corp. and each of its subsidiaries and (ii) with respect to Memorial
Resource Development Corp. and its subsidiaries, the term “Affiliate” shall exclude PennTex Midstream Partners, LLC and each of its subsidiaries.
perturbation.changed_text:
“Affiliate” shall mean, when used with respect to any Person, any other Person that, directly or indirectly, through one or more
intermediaries, controls, is controlled by, or is under common control with such Person. For this purpose, “control” of any Person shall mean the
possession, directly or indirectly, of the power to direct or cause the direction of the management and policies of such Person, solely by ownership of
voting interest. For the purposes of this Agreement, (i) with respect to PennTex Midstream Partners, LLC and its
subsidiaries, the term “Affiliate” shall exclude Memorial Resource Development Corp. and each of its subsidiaries and (ii) with respect to Memorial
Resource Development Corp. and its subsidiaries, the term “Affiliate” shall exclude PennTex Midstream Partners, LLC and each of its subsidiaries.
perturbation.explanation: The original definition of "Affiliate" allows control to be exerted through ownership of voting interest, by contract, or otherwise. The modified definition restricts control solely to ownership of voting interest. This introduces ambiguity and potential disputes, as a party might be considered an affiliate under one definition but not the other, affecting contractual obligations and liabilities.

perturbation.original_text:
“Product(s)” means a demethanized mixture of natural gas liquids comprised primarily of ethane, propane, iso-butane, normal butane, iso-
pentane, normal pentane, hexanes and heavier hydrocarbons, incidental volumes of methane, as well as other non-hydrocarbon compounds.
perturbation.changed_text:
“Product(s)” means a demethanized mixture of natural gas liquids comprised exclusively of ethane, propane, iso-butane, normal butane, iso-
pentane, normal pentane, hexanes and heavier hydrocarbons.
perturbation.explanation: The original definition of 'Product(s)' includes 'primarily' these elements whereas in the modified version it changes to 'exclusively'. This can cause discrepancies when other sections of the document refer to 'Product(s)' with different interpretation in mind. A question of, for instance, other liability and risk in transporting them arises. This causes in text contradiction.

perturbation.original_text: “Shipper” means the party that contracts with Carrier for transportation of Products on the System in accordance with this Tariff.
perturbation.changed_text: “Shipper” means the party that contracts with Carrier for transportation of Products on the System, and has been a client of Carrier's for at least 5 years.
perturbation.explanation: This introduces a new condition on what the definition of a 'Shipper' is. This is a direct contradiction with other sections of the documents which assume that a shipper is 'any party' that contracts with the Carrier.
